name: GiveMeInspiration
0:
”Alexa, give me inspiration”
”Alexa, ask Give Me Inspiration for a quote”
”Alexa, ask Give Me Inspiration for the thought of the day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: give me inspiration
des: The purpose of the Give Me Inspiration skill is to provide inspirational quotes on demand. Simply ask the Give Me Inspiration skill for a motivational quote and it will randomly choose one from it's database of over 1000 quotes. The skill is ideally used first thing in the morning each day to give you your thought for the day. We're adding more quotes all the time and will keep updating this skill to add extra features. Enjoy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
